scripts.deploy:image: docker build -t jake0627a1/voltiq:latest -f ./apps/frontend/Dockerfile . && docker push jake0627a1/voltiq:latest
scripts.dev:argocd: kubectl create namespace argocd && kubectl apply -n argocd -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/argoproj/argo-cd/stable/manifests/install.yaml && kubectl port-forward svc/argocd-server -n argocd 8080:443
scripts.get:argocd-password: kubectl get secret argocd-initial-admin-secret -n argocd -o jsonpath='{.data.password}' | base64 -d
